name: PEM Entities LLC v. Levin
question: Should bankruptcy courts apply a federal rule of decision (as five circuits have held) or a state law rule of decision (as two circuits have held) when deciding to recharacterize a debt claim in bankruptcy as a capital contribution?
description: A case in which the Court was asked to resolve a circuit split as to whether bankruptcy courts should apply a federal rule of decision (as five circuits have held) or a state law rule of decision (as two circuits have held) when deciding to recharacterize a debt claim in bankruptcy as a capital contribution.
